properties.name: Summer Wars
properties.description: Summer Wars (Japanese: サマーウォーズ) is a 2009 Japanese animated sci-fi film directed by Mamoru Hosoda and produced by Madhouse. The film tells the story of a student tries to fix a problem he accidentally caused in OZ, a digital world, while pretending to be the fiancé of his friend at her grandmother's 90th birthday. The film was well-received by critics and the general audience and was financially successful, earning $18 million worldwide.

properties.name: Ueda Castle
properties.description: The castle was the inspiration for gate of the Jinnouchi family's compound in Summer Wars.
